summary: This document is a correspondence from Holland & Knight LLP to Alex Rossmiller, an Assistant U.S. Attorney, regarding a Grand Jury Subpoena directed to FirstBank Puerto Rico. It details the production of documents related to various accounts associated with Jeffrey Epstein and others, in compliance with the subpoena.

persons.name: Michael E. Hantman
persons.context: Michael E. Hantman is the attorney representing FirstBank Puerto Rico in relation to the Grand Jury Subpoena.

persons.name: Alex Rossmiller
persons.context: Alex Rossmiller is the Assistant U.S. Attorney receiving the correspondence regarding the Grand Jury Subpoena.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is mentioned as the account holder for multiple accounts at FirstBank Puerto Rico in connection with the Grand Jury Subpoena.

persons.name: Darren K. Indyke
persons.context: Darren K. Indyke is listed as an authorized signatory on several accounts associated with Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.name: Cecile R. De-Jongh
persons.context: Cecile R. De-Jongh is mentioned as an authorized signatory on accounts associated with Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.name: Harry Beller
persons.context: Harry Beller is listed as an authorized signatory on accounts associated with Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.name: Jeanne Brennan-Wiebracht
persons.context: Jeanne Brennan-Wiebracht is mentioned as an authorized signatory on accounts associated with Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.name: Ghislaine N. Maxwell
persons.context: Ghislaine N. Maxwell is mentioned in connection with an account associated with Jeffrey Epstein.

connections.description: Darren K. Indyke is an authorized signatory on multiple accounts held by Jeffrey Epstein.
Cecile R. De-Jongh is an authorized signatory on accounts held by Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: Grand Jury Subpoena Issued
events.description: A Grand Jury Subpoena was issued to FirstBank Puerto Rico regarding accounts associated with Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: FirstBank Letter
events.description: FirstBank provided a letter detailing accounts related to the Grand Jury Subpoena.

keyFacts: The document is a correspondence regarding a Grand Jury Subpoena directed to FirstBank Puerto Rico.
Multiple accounts associated with Jeffrey Epstein are detailed in the document.
Darren K. Indyke is frequently mentioned as an authorized signatory on Epstein's accounts.
The document includes a list of account holders and their associated accounts with FirstBank Puerto Rico.
There are mentions of other individuals as authorized signatories on Epstein's accounts.
